info.name: BridgePlusMorePrintable
info.description: Print the "Bridge+More" results and related pages in a useful way: with visible card suits, with marked winners in the play sequences and without sidebars and other non-essential elements and spacing (and without truncating texts).
info.additionalInfo:
* 20170807 r1.2.0: Support production server with a few minor improvements

* 20150718 r1.1.0: Board details: mark the pairs that the play sequence belongs to

* 20150718 r1.0.0: First public release
